completion_requirements: You have checked the status of your ride.
completion_questions: ...tell you the status of your ride?
...stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?
User.task_description: Some hours ago you've booked a cab to pick up your friend from the airport. He's still not here. Ask the assistant about the status of his ride (booking id 183. You booked the ride under the name 'Alexis'.

Wizard.task_description: Help the user stay informed about the status of his/her ride. (You can find the video tutorial under https://wolfr.am/LxzdOazi, in case you want to watch it again.)
completion_requirements: Informed the user about the status of their ride,
completion_questions: ...change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
...become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue?
